meanings.definition: A type of parasitic flowering plant with large, foul-smelling flowers.
meanings.sent1: The rafflesia bloomed in the forest, emitting a strong odor.
meanings.sent2: I saw a rafflesia in the botanical garden, and its flower was huge!
meanings.sent3: The rafflesia thought it was a rose, but its smell gave it away.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was as potent as a rafflesia in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The rafflesia's flower was so big, it overshadowed everything around it.

meanings.definition: The genus to which the rafflesia plant belongs.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the rafflesia genus to understand its unique characteristics.
meanings.sent2: The rafflesia genus includes some of the largest flowers in the world.
meanings.sent3: In the world of plants, the rafflesia genus is like a royal family.
meanings.sent4: The diversity within the rafflesia genus is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the rafflesia genus reveals nature's incredible diversity.
